1.text: Wash your hands or use hand sanitizer.

2.text: Avoid touching the front of your face covering.

3.text: Hold your mask by the ear loops to gently lift and pull the mask off.
3.vid: /7/7c/Properly Take Off a Face Mask Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Untie the bottom bow of a mask with ties.
4.vid: /2/22/Properly Take Off a Face Mask Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Clean or dispose of your mask immediately.
5.vid: /8/86/Properly Take Off a Face Mask Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Disinfect your hands again after removing your mask.
6.vid: /7/76/Properly Take Off a Face Mask Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Clean your hands before putting your mask on.

8.text: Use the stiff edge at the top to secure the mask over your nose.
8.vid: /2/25/Properly Take Off a Face Mask Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Secure the mask over your nose and mouth.
9.vid: /d/de/Properly Take Off a Face Mask Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Fit the face covering snugly around the sides of your face.
10.vid: /5/5d/Properly Take Off a Face Mask Step 10.360p.mp4

11.text: Keep your face covering over your nose and mouth at all times.

12.text: Rotate masks so that you're always wearing a clean one.
